name: Coding 1 [Final Project]
description:
The final project from Hunter Good in Coding 1.  The player must navigate a 2D plat-former and collect 2 power ups.  The first power up allows the player to hold in air and the 2nd power allows the player to jump from wall to wall.  The final goal is to climb the hole the player first fell down.

A few bugs and extra descriptions were added to the game
